title: Our first look at a component
displayTitle: Our first look at a component
body:
This component you're reading is a text component. All components take this form of a title and body - except a blank component. However it's important to realise that title and body attributes are not needed.

Take for instance the media component opposite or below on a smaller device - has no body attribute. Instead of the HTML being rendered Adapt simply doesn't render it. The title attribute is simply a break tag to push the media component level with the opposite component.

_items.content: The Our Functions module will focus on your role and the function you work in
_items.feedback: The Our Functions module will focus on all of the functions within Unilever and how they work together to create a better business – there is a module specifically for your function, but that is separate!

_items.content: The Business Ambitions module is about Unilever’s goals and objectives, as well as expectations for Unilever employees
_items.feedback: This statement is true! The Business Ambitions module will outline our expectations, objectives and goals.

_items.content: The Helpful Tools module is about self-serving HR and IT resources which will help you in your role
_items.feedback: This statement is true! The Helpful Tools module will show you various HR and IT tools to help you control your path.

_items.content: Key HR Processes will cover administrative information but won’t go into detail about rewards and pensions
_items.feedback: The Key HR Processes module will cover a wide range of information, including rewards and pensions.

_feedbacks.content: Could do better – as you didn’t answer the majority of the questions correctly you haven’t earned a reward this time.
Not bad! You answered most of the questions in the challenge correctly so you have earned a silver badge!
